meaning_str.bing:
n. 目标；靶；指标；对象
v. 面向；把…作为攻击目标；把…作为批评的对象
网络. 塔吉特；靶子；塔吉特百货

面向；把…作为攻击目标；把…作为批评的对象
塔吉特；靶子；塔吉特百货

目标；靶子；对象；指标；标的；攻击目标；（营销或宣传的）受众；（攻击或批评的）焦点；目的物
瞄准；针对；定位；设定（目标）；选定为目标；专门对付；将…作为攻击目标；把…作为批评的对象

1.en: Police believe she was the main target of the attack -- the first shooting of a member of Congress in more than 30 years.
1.cn: 警方认为她是这起枪击案的主要目标。这是近30年来第一次发生在国会议员身上的枪击案。

2.en: He said gambling at hometown associations was an easy target for prosecutors who want to generate headlines.
2.cn: 他说，同乡会的赌博很容易被想制造头条的检察官当成靶子。

3.en: Therefore, anticancer therapies that target RNAs seem to be one step closer to being a new class of anticancer drug.
3.cn: 因此，靶标RNA的抗癌治疗似乎让我们向寻找一类新的抗癌药物跨近了一步。

0.en: No, the judg is the target. Schakowsky?
0.cn: 不行，法官就是我们的目标。沙考斯基？

1.en: For many months now, my new target has been you.
1.cn: 这几个月来，我的新目标就是你。

2.en: Church said the target's name was Victor Minns.
2.cn: 教堂说目标的名字叫维克多·明斯。

3.en: And that makes him a target? Objection. Argumentative. Come on.
3.cn: 这是否令他成为攻击目标？反对，提问有争议。又来吗。

4.en: Target, opportunity, all the intel you could ask for, and you got decimated and my target walked away.
4.cn: 目标，机会，还有你需要的所有情报可是你，却打了败仗，让目标逃之夭夭。

5.en: When they get on target, and they will get on target, wait to engage.
5.cn: 当她们锁定目标，她们一定会锁定等待发动进攻。

6.en: That's my target when I'm by myself and now my target at the new shop.
6.cn: 我单身时也是向这些人下手的，而他们现在是我新店的目标客户。

7.en: Don't worry. You're small and weak. That'll make you less of a target.
7.cn: 放心，你太瘦弱，绝对不会是攻击的目标。

8.en: We got one good target, gentlemen. Do not shoot my Raptors. Please.
8.cn: 我们只有一个目标，先生们，不要伤了我的迅猛龙，拜托了。

9.en: Our target is Owen Shaw. Former major in the S.A.S., Spec-ops soldier.
9.cn: 我们的目标是欧文·肖，原英国特种空勤队的少校，特种兵。

10.en: State funeral. Must-attend event for western leaders. Each one a target.
10.cn: 国葬仪式，西方领导人必定出席的事件，每个人都是目标。

11.en: Of course wait. I'm the target, targets wait. Look, whatever is coming, whatever he's lined up, I'll know when it begins.
11.cn: 当然要等，我是目标，目标就得等，听着，不管会发生什么，他有什么计划，一旦开始，我自然会知道。

12.en: So, as far as the Americans are concern, you're a rogue assassin, a target of opportunity.
12.cn: 所以至少在美国方面，你是个凶残的杀手，通缉的目标。

13.en: Skipper, look. Above Private. Dave's next target, Shanghai's famous mermaid penguins.
13.cn: 老大，看，菜鸟上面，戴夫的下一个目标，上海著名的企鹅美人鱼。

14.en: Ma'am. The First Order, they're charging the weapon again now. Our system is the next target.
14.cn: 夫人。第一秩序现在正在重新装载他们的武器，下次目标是我们的星系。

15.en: Roll up, roll up. Hit the target and win a giant Teddy. You can do that easy, Mummy.
15.cn: 快来吧，快来吧。只要射中目标就可以有一个大熊猫哦。妈妈，这个你也可以做得到。

16.en: Great. We found a cooling solution that allowed us to get the size of the prototype down to the target specs.
16.cn: 很好。我们研究出一个冷却方案可以让原型机的大小缩小至目标规格。

17.en: Entire divisions within the government are using versions of his product, which makes him a prime target for hackers.
17.cn: 政府部门的整个机构都在用他的产品，所以他是黑客的主要目标。

18.en: Keep it simple, eyes on the ball, shoulders up, see your foot hit it, drive through the ball. Finish at your target!
18.cn: 简单点，看着球，抬起肩膀，看见你的脚踢到球，把球踢飞，完成目标！

19.en: We have information that Downtown Chicago is the next target. And they're planning to detonate a dirty bomb.
19.cn: 我们得到消息芝加哥市中心是下一个目标，他们准备在市中心引爆放射性炸弹。
